original_text: And I looked, and, behold, ye had sinned against the Lord your God, and had made you a molten calf: ye had turned aside quickly out of the way which the Lord had commanded you.
korean_text: 내가 본즉 너희가 너희의 하나님 여호와께 범죄하여 자기를 위하여 송아지를 부어 만들어서 여호와께서 명령하신 도를 빨리 떠났기로

sentences.original_text: ye had sinned against the Lord your God,
and had made you a molten calf:
out of the way which the Lord had commanded you.
